Absolute Leadership Development Motivational Program Director Toll-Free: 1-866-432-4464 www.absoluteontheweb.com email: booking@absoluteontheweb.com
Absolute Leadership Development is a non-profit organization that exists to help students realize their incredible value and potential, and empower them to change their world. Our high school teams have traveled in every province in Canada and have spoken to over 600,000 students to date.
For 2005/2006, our new "Everyday Heroes" tour will inspire your students to become "heroes to themselves, to others and to their world". The content of this 1 hour presentation focuses around current teen issues,
bullying
sex
self-worth
substance abuse
global citizenship
but every topic covered is embedded with a message of purpose. Much more than just a screen or a speech, our message actually gets through to the audience because it is presented in way that is relevant to this generation:
live professional band
real people sharing their personal stories
light show
multi-media
comedy and crowd interaction
Please contact us to book this motivational experience at your school!
